The single songs in the new opera, call'd The world in the moon. Sett by Mr. Daniel Purcell, and Mr. Clark Purcell, Daniel, 1660?-1717. Clarke, Jeremiah, 1669?-1707. aut Settle, Elkanah, 1648-1724. World in the moon. aut
[2], 8 p. : music
printed by J. Heptinstall, for Henry Playford at his shop in the Temple Change Fleetstreet, where also may be had a general catalogue of all the musick-books for this thirty years last past down to this present time, London : 1697.
Advertisement at foot of final page. At foot of title page: Prince six pence. Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
=======
